item.description:
Ola' Gente,

I would like to socialize a little before the Mariza Concert, however all are welcome to join this event regardless if you are or are not going to the concert.

The concert starts at 8pm and it is a five minute walk from the Match Lounge.

The plan is to meet at 6:30pm and hang out for an hour and then walk on over to the concert down the street at the Berklee Performance Center at 126 Mass. Ave.

I am look forward to seeing familiar and new faces.

Joana

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Happy Hour Before the Mariza Concert - All Welcome
